History.Hint: This is your message history. Sent and received messages will appear here while you're logged in and until you refresh your browser.

LAME.WhisperHint: Type your whisper here. Send message by pressing Ctrl-Enter.

Setting.ShowNotificationForNewWhisperHint: Should a visual notification be shown every time a whisper is received?
Setting.PermanentNotificationForNewWhisperHint: Should the visual notification stay until you dismiss it?
